loadSamples

public void loadSamples(java.lang.String dataFile,
                        boolean treatMissingValuesAsZero)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Adds samples from an ARFF or XRFF data file. Loaded samples replace any previous contents of the Weka data set.

Specified by:
loadSamples in interface SampleClassifier
Parameters:
dataFile - data file to load
treatMissingValuesAsZero - for sparse datasets in xrff format, whether to set missing feature values to 0.
